text: XIV
text_tokenized: XIV

text: Mrs. Elton was first seen at church : but though devotion might be interrupted , curiosity could not be satisfied by a bride in a pew , and it must be left for the visits in form which were then to be paid , to settle whether she were very pretty indeed , or only rather pretty , or not pretty at all . Emma had feelings , less of curiosity than of pride or propriety , to make her resolve on not being the last to pay her respects ; and she made a point of Harriet 's going with her , that the worst of the business might be gone through as soon as possible . She could not enter the house again , could not be in the same room to which she had with such vain artifice retreated three months ago , to lace up her boot , without _ recollecting _ .
text_tokenized: Mrs. Elton was first seen at church : but though devotion might be interrupted , curiosity could not be satisfied by a bride in a pew , and it must be left for the visits in form which were then to be paid , to settle whether she were very pretty indeed , or only rather pretty , or not pretty at all . Emma had feelings , less of curiosity than of pride or propriety , to make her resolve on not being the last to pay her respects ; and she made a point of Harriet 's going with her , that the worst of the business might be gone through as soon as possible . She could not enter the house again , could not be in the same room to which she had with such vain artifice retreated three months ago , to lace up her boot , without _ recollecting _ .

text: A thousand vexatious thoughts would recur .
text_tokenized: A thousand vexatious thoughts would recur .

text: Compliments , charades , and horrible blunders ; and it was not to be supposed that poor Harriet should not be recollecting too ; but she behaved very well , and was only rather pale and silent .
text_tokenized: Compliments , charades , and horrible blunders ; and it was not to be supposed that poor Harriet should not be recollecting too ; but she behaved very well , and was only rather pale and silent .

text: The visit was of course short ; and there was so much embarrassment and occupation of mind to shorten it , that Emma would not allow herself entirely to form an opinion of the lady , and on no account to give one , beyond the nothing - meaning terms of being " elegantly dressed , and very pleasing . "
text_tokenized: The visit was of course short ; and there was so much embarrassment and occupation of mind to shorten it , that Emma would not allow herself entirely to form an opinion of the lady , and on no account to give one , beyond the nothing - meaning terms of being " elegantly dressed , and very pleasing . "

text: She did not really like her .
text_tokenized: She did not really like her .

text: She would not be in a hurry to find fault , but she suspected that there was no elegance;--ease , but not elegance.-- She was almost sure that for a young woman , a stranger , a bride , there was too much ease . Her person was rather good ; her face not unpretty ; but neither feature , nor air , nor voice , nor manner , were elegant . Emma thought at least it would turn out so .
text_tokenized: She would not be in a hurry to find fault , but she suspected that there was no elegance;--ease , but not elegance.-- She was almost sure that for a young woman , a stranger , a bride , there was too much ease . Her person was rather good ; her face not unpretty ; but neither feature , nor air , nor voice , nor manner , were elegant . Emma thought at least it would turn out so .

text: As for Mr. Elton , his manners did not appear -- but no , she would not permit a hasty or a witty word from herself about his manners .
text_tokenized: As for Mr. Elton , his manners did not appear -- but no , she would not permit a hasty or a witty word from herself about his manners .

text: It was an awkward ceremony at any time to be receiving wedding visits , and a man had need be all grace to acquit himself well through it .
text_tokenized: It was an awkward ceremony at any time to be receiving wedding visits , and a man had need be all grace to acquit himself well through it .

text: The woman was better off ; she might have the assistance of fine clothes , and the privilege of bashfulness , but the man had only his own good sense to depend on ; and when she considered how peculiarly unlucky poor Mr. Elton was in being in the same room at once with the woman he had just married , the woman he had wanted to marry , and the woman whom he had been expected to marry , she must allow him to have the right to look as little wise , and to be as much affectedly , and as little really easy as could be . " Well , Miss Woodhouse , " said Harriet , when they had quitted the house , and after waiting in vain for her friend to begin ;
text_tokenized: The woman was better off ; she might have the assistance of fine clothes , and the privilege of bashfulness , but the man had only his own good sense to depend on ; and when she considered how peculiarly unlucky poor Mr. Elton was in being in the same room at once with the woman he had just married , the woman he had wanted to marry , and the woman whom he had been expected to marry , she must allow him to have the right to look as little wise , and to be as much affectedly , and as little really easy as could be . " Well , Miss Woodhouse , " said Harriet , when they had quitted the house , and after waiting in vain for her friend to begin ;

text: " Well , Miss Woodhouse , ( with a gentle sigh , ) what do you think of her?-- Is not she very charming ?
text_tokenized: " Well , Miss Woodhouse , ( with a gentle sigh , ) what do you think of her?-- Is not she very charming ?

text: " There was a little hesitation in Emma 's answer .
text_tokenized: " There was a little hesitation in Emma 's answer .

text: Oh !
text_tokenized: Oh !

text: yes -- very -- a very pleasing young woman .
text_tokenized: yes -- very -- a very pleasing young woman .

text: " I think her beautiful , quite beautiful . " " Very nicely dressed , indeed ; a remarkably elegant gown . " " I am not at all surprized that he should have fallen in love . "
text_tokenized: " I think her beautiful , quite beautiful . " " Very nicely dressed , indeed ; a remarkably elegant gown . " " I am not at all surprized that he should have fallen in love . "

text: " Oh ! no -- there is nothing to surprize one at all.--A pretty fortune ; and she came in his way . " " I dare say , " returned Harriet , sighing again , " I dare say she was very much attached to him . " " Perhaps she might ; but it is not every man 's fate to marry the woman who loves him best . Miss Hawkins perhaps wanted a home , and thought this the best offer she was likely to have . " " Yes , " said Harriet earnestly , " and well she might , nobody could ever have a better .
text_tokenized: " Oh ! no -- there is nothing to surprize one at all.--A pretty fortune ; and she came in his way . " " I dare say , " returned Harriet , sighing again , " I dare say she was very much attached to him . " " Perhaps she might ; but it is not every man 's fate to marry the woman who loves him best . Miss Hawkins perhaps wanted a home , and thought this the best offer she was likely to have . " " Yes , " said Harriet earnestly , " and well she might , nobody could ever have a better .

text: Well , I wish them happy with all my heart .
text_tokenized: Well , I wish them happy with all my heart .

text: And now , Miss Woodhouse , I do not think I shall mind seeing them again .
text_tokenized: And now , Miss Woodhouse , I do not think I shall mind seeing them again .

text: He is just as superior as ever;--but being married , you know , it is quite a different thing .
text_tokenized: He is just as superior as ever;--but being married , you know , it is quite a different thing .

text: No , indeed , Miss Woodhouse , you need not be afraid ; I can sit and admire him now without any great misery .
text_tokenized: No , indeed , Miss Woodhouse , you need not be afraid ; I can sit and admire him now without any great misery .

text: To know that he has not thrown himself away , is such a comfort!-- She does seem a charming young woman , just what he deserves .
text_tokenized: To know that he has not thrown himself away , is such a comfort!-- She does seem a charming young woman , just what he deserves .

text: Happy creature !
text_tokenized: Happy creature !

text: He called her ` Augusta . ' How delightful ! " When the visit was returned , Emma made up her mind . She could then see more and judge better .
text_tokenized: He called her ` Augusta . ' How delightful ! " When the visit was returned , Emma made up her mind . She could then see more and judge better .

text: From Harriet 's happening not to be at Hartfield , and her father 's being present to engage Mr. Elton , she had a quarter of an hour of the lady 's conversation to herself , and could composedly attend to her ; and the quarter of an hour quite convinced her that Mrs. Elton was a vain woman , extremely well satisfied with herself , and thinking much of her own importance ; that she meant to shine and be very superior , but with manners which had been formed in a bad school , pert and familiar ; that all her notions were drawn from one set of people , and one style of living ; that if not foolish she was ignorant , and that her society would certainly do Mr. Elton no good . Harriet would have been a better match .
text_tokenized: From Harriet 's happening not to be at Hartfield , and her father 's being present to engage Mr. Elton , she had a quarter of an hour of the lady 's conversation to herself , and could composedly attend to her ; and the quarter of an hour quite convinced her that Mrs. Elton was a vain woman , extremely well satisfied with herself , and thinking much of her own importance ; that she meant to shine and be very superior , but with manners which had been formed in a bad school , pert and familiar ; that all her notions were drawn from one set of people , and one style of living ; that if not foolish she was ignorant , and that her society would certainly do Mr. Elton no good . Harriet would have been a better match .

text: If not wise or refined herself , she would have connected him with those who were ; but Miss Hawkins , it might be fairly supposed from her easy conceit , had been the best of her own set .
text_tokenized: If not wise or refined herself , she would have connected him with those who were ; but Miss Hawkins , it might be fairly supposed from her easy conceit , had been the best of her own set .

text: The rich brother - in - law near Bristol was the pride of the alliance , and his place and his carriages were the pride of him .
text_tokenized: The rich brother - in - law near Bristol was the pride of the alliance , and his place and his carriages were the pride of him .

text: The very first subject after being seated was Maple Grove , " My brother Mr. Suckling 's seat;"--a comparison of Hartfield to Maple Grove .
text_tokenized: The very first subject after being seated was Maple Grove , " My brother Mr. Suckling 's seat;"--a comparison of Hartfield to Maple Grove .

text: The grounds of Hartfield were small , but neat and pretty ; and the house was modern and well - built .
text_tokenized: The grounds of Hartfield were small , but neat and pretty ; and the house was modern and well - built .

text: Mrs. Elton seemed most favourably impressed by the size of the room , the entrance , and all that she could see or imagine .
text_tokenized: Mrs. Elton seemed most favourably impressed by the size of the room , the entrance , and all that she could see or imagine .

text: " Very like Maple Grove indeed!--She was quite struck by the likeness!--That room was the very shape and size of the morning - room at Maple Grove ; her sister 's favourite room .
text_tokenized: " Very like Maple Grove indeed!--She was quite struck by the likeness!--That room was the very shape and size of the morning - room at Maple Grove ; her sister 's favourite room .

text: Mr. Elton was appealed to.--"Was not it astonishingly like?-- She could really almost fancy herself at Maple Grove . "
text_tokenized: Mr. Elton was appealed to.--"Was not it astonishingly like?-- She could really almost fancy herself at Maple Grove . "

text: " And the staircase -- You know , as I came in , I observed how very like the staircase was ; placed exactly in the same part of the house .
text_tokenized: " And the staircase -- You know , as I came in , I observed how very like the staircase was ; placed exactly in the same part of the house .

text: I really could not help exclaiming !
text_tokenized: I really could not help exclaiming !

text: I assure you , Miss Woodhouse , it is very delightful to me , to be reminded of a place I am so extremely partial to as Maple Grove .
text_tokenized: I assure you , Miss Woodhouse , it is very delightful to me , to be reminded of a place I am so extremely partial to as Maple Grove .

text: I have spent so many happy months there ! ( with a little sigh of sentiment ) .
text_tokenized: I have spent so many happy months there ! ( with a little sigh of sentiment ) .

text: A charming place , undoubtedly .
text_tokenized: A charming place , undoubtedly .

text: Every body who sees it is struck by its beauty ; but to me , it has been quite a home . Whenever you are transplanted , like me , Miss Woodhouse , you will understand how very delightful it is to meet with any thing at all like what one has left behind .
text_tokenized: Every body who sees it is struck by its beauty ; but to me , it has been quite a home . Whenever you are transplanted , like me , Miss Woodhouse , you will understand how very delightful it is to meet with any thing at all like what one has left behind .

text: I always say this is quite one of the evils of matrimony . "
text_tokenized: I always say this is quite one of the evils of matrimony . "

text: Emma made as slight a reply as she could ; but it was fully sufficient for Mrs. Elton , who only wanted to be talking herself .
text_tokenized: Emma made as slight a reply as she could ; but it was fully sufficient for Mrs. Elton , who only wanted to be talking herself .

text: " So extremely like Maple Grove !
text_tokenized: " So extremely like Maple Grove !

text: And it is not merely the house-- the grounds , I assure you , as far as I could observe , are strikingly like .
text_tokenized: And it is not merely the house-- the grounds , I assure you , as far as I could observe , are strikingly like .

text: The laurels at Maple Grove are in the same profusion as here , and stand very much in the same way -- just across the lawn ; and I had a glimpse of a fine large tree , with a bench round it , which put me so exactly in mind ! My brother and sister will be enchanted with this place .
text_tokenized: The laurels at Maple Grove are in the same profusion as here , and stand very much in the same way -- just across the lawn ; and I had a glimpse of a fine large tree , with a bench round it , which put me so exactly in mind ! My brother and sister will be enchanted with this place .

text: People who have extensive grounds themselves are always pleased with any thing in the same style . "
text_tokenized: People who have extensive grounds themselves are always pleased with any thing in the same style . "

text: Emma doubted the truth of this sentiment .
text_tokenized: Emma doubted the truth of this sentiment .

text: She had a great idea that people who had extensive grounds themselves cared very little for the extensive grounds of any body else ; but it was not worth while to attack an error so double - dyed , and therefore only said in reply , " When you have seen more of this country , I am afraid you will think you have overrated Hartfield .
text_tokenized: She had a great idea that people who had extensive grounds themselves cared very little for the extensive grounds of any body else ; but it was not worth while to attack an error so double - dyed , and therefore only said in reply , " When you have seen more of this country , I am afraid you will think you have overrated Hartfield .

text: Surry is full of beauties .
text_tokenized: Surry is full of beauties .

text: " Oh !
text_tokenized: " Oh !

text: yes , I am quite aware of that .
text_tokenized: yes , I am quite aware of that .

text: It is the garden of England , you know .
text_tokenized: It is the garden of England , you know .

text: Surry is the garden of England . " " Yes ; but we must not rest our claims on that distinction .
text_tokenized: Surry is the garden of England . " " Yes ; but we must not rest our claims on that distinction .

text: Many counties , I believe , are called the garden of England , as well as Surry . " " No , I fancy not , " replied Mrs. Elton , with a most satisfied smile .
text_tokenized: Many counties , I believe , are called the garden of England , as well as Surry . " " No , I fancy not , " replied Mrs. Elton , with a most satisfied smile .

text: I never heard any county but Surry called so . "
text_tokenized: I never heard any county but Surry called so . "

text: Emma was silenced .
text_tokenized: Emma was silenced .

text: " My brother and sister have promised us a visit in the spring , or summer at farthest , " continued Mrs. Elton ; " and that will be our time for exploring .
text_tokenized: " My brother and sister have promised us a visit in the spring , or summer at farthest , " continued Mrs. Elton ; " and that will be our time for exploring .

text: While they are with us , we shall explore a great deal , I dare say .
text_tokenized: While they are with us , we shall explore a great deal , I dare say .

text: They will have their barouche - landau , of course , which holds four perfectly ; and therefore , without saying any thing of _ our _ carriage , we should be able to explore the different beauties extremely well .
text_tokenized: They will have their barouche - landau , of course , which holds four perfectly ; and therefore , without saying any thing of _ our _ carriage , we should be able to explore the different beauties extremely well .

text: They would hardly come in their chaise , I think , at that season of the year .
text_tokenized: They would hardly come in their chaise , I think , at that season of the year .

text: Indeed , when the time draws on , I shall decidedly recommend their bringing the barouche - landau ; it will be so very much preferable . When people come into a beautiful country of this sort , you know , Miss Woodhouse , one naturally wishes them to see as much as possible ; and Mr. Suckling is extremely fond of exploring . We explored to King's - Weston twice last summer , in that way , most delightfully , just after their first having the barouche - landau .
text_tokenized: Indeed , when the time draws on , I shall decidedly recommend their bringing the barouche - landau ; it will be so very much preferable . When people come into a beautiful country of this sort , you know , Miss Woodhouse , one naturally wishes them to see as much as possible ; and Mr. Suckling is extremely fond of exploring . We explored to King's - Weston twice last summer , in that way , most delightfully , just after their first having the barouche - landau .

text: You have many parties of that kind here , I suppose , Miss Woodhouse , every summer ? " " No ; not immediately here . We are rather out of distance of the very striking beauties which attract the sort of parties you speak of ; and we are a very quiet set of people , I believe ; more disposed to stay at home than engage in schemes of pleasure .
text_tokenized: You have many parties of that kind here , I suppose , Miss Woodhouse , every summer ? " " No ; not immediately here . We are rather out of distance of the very striking beauties which attract the sort of parties you speak of ; and we are a very quiet set of people , I believe ; more disposed to stay at home than engage in schemes of pleasure .

text: " Ah !
text_tokenized: " Ah !

text: there is nothing like staying at home for real comfort .
text_tokenized: there is nothing like staying at home for real comfort .

text: Nobody can be more devoted to home than I am .
text_tokenized: Nobody can be more devoted to home than I am .

text: I was quite a proverb for it at Maple Grove .
text_tokenized: I was quite a proverb for it at Maple Grove .

text: Many a time has Selina said , when she has been going to Bristol , ` I really can not get this girl to move from the house .
text_tokenized: Many a time has Selina said , when she has been going to Bristol , ` I really can not get this girl to move from the house .

text: I absolutely must go in by myself , though I hate being stuck up in the barouche - landau without a companion ; but Augusta , I believe , with her own good - will , would never stir beyond the park paling . '
text_tokenized: I absolutely must go in by myself , though I hate being stuck up in the barouche - landau without a companion ; but Augusta , I believe , with her own good - will , would never stir beyond the park paling . '

text: Many a time has she said so ; and yet I am no advocate for entire seclusion .
text_tokenized: Many a time has she said so ; and yet I am no advocate for entire seclusion .

text: I think , on the contrary , when people shut themselves up entirely from society , it is a very bad thing ; and that it is much more advisable to mix in the world in a proper degree , without living in it either too much or too little . I perfectly understand your situation , however , Miss Woodhouse-- ( looking towards Mr. Woodhouse ) , Your father 's state of health must be a great drawback .
text_tokenized: I think , on the contrary , when people shut themselves up entirely from society , it is a very bad thing ; and that it is much more advisable to mix in the world in a proper degree , without living in it either too much or too little . I perfectly understand your situation , however , Miss Woodhouse-- ( looking towards Mr. Woodhouse ) , Your father 's state of health must be a great drawback .

text: Why does not he try Bath?--Indeed he should .
text_tokenized: Why does not he try Bath?--Indeed he should .

text: Let me recommend Bath to you .
text_tokenized: Let me recommend Bath to you .

text: I assure you I have no doubt of its doing Mr. Woodhouse good . " " My father tried it more than once , formerly ; but without receiving any benefit ; and Mr. Perry , whose name , I dare say , is not unknown to you , does not conceive it would be at all more likely to be useful now . " " Ah !
text_tokenized: I assure you I have no doubt of its doing Mr. Woodhouse good . " " My father tried it more than once , formerly ; but without receiving any benefit ; and Mr. Perry , whose name , I dare say , is not unknown to you , does not conceive it would be at all more likely to be useful now . " " Ah !

text: that 's a great pity ; for I assure you , Miss Woodhouse , where the waters do agree , it is quite wonderful the relief they give .
text_tokenized: that 's a great pity ; for I assure you , Miss Woodhouse , where the waters do agree , it is quite wonderful the relief they give .

text: In my Bath life , I have seen such instances of it !
text_tokenized: In my Bath life , I have seen such instances of it !

text: And it is so cheerful a place , that it could not fail of being of use to Mr. Woodhouse 's spirits , which , I understand , are sometimes much depressed . And as to its recommendations to _ you _ , I fancy I need not take much pains to dwell on them .
text_tokenized: And it is so cheerful a place , that it could not fail of being of use to Mr. Woodhouse 's spirits , which , I understand , are sometimes much depressed . And as to its recommendations to _ you _ , I fancy I need not take much pains to dwell on them .

text: The advantages of Bath to the young are pretty generally understood .
text_tokenized: The advantages of Bath to the young are pretty generally understood .

text: It would be a charming introduction for you , who have lived so secluded a life ; and I could immediately secure you some of the best society in the place .
text_tokenized: It would be a charming introduction for you , who have lived so secluded a life ; and I could immediately secure you some of the best society in the place .

text: A line from me would bring you a little host of acquaintance ; and my particular friend , Mrs. Partridge , the lady I have always resided with when in Bath , would be most happy to shew you any attentions , and would be the very person for you to go into public with . " It was as much as Emma could bear , without being impolite .
text_tokenized: A line from me would bring you a little host of acquaintance ; and my particular friend , Mrs. Partridge , the lady I have always resided with when in Bath , would be most happy to shew you any attentions , and would be the very person for you to go into public with . " It was as much as Emma could bear , without being impolite .

text: The idea of her being indebted to Mrs. Elton for what was called an _ introduction_--of her going into public under the auspices of a friend of Mrs. Elton's -- probably some vulgar , dashing widow , who , with the help of a boarder , just made a shift to live!-- The dignity of Miss Woodhouse , of Hartfield , was sunk indeed !
text_tokenized: The idea of her being indebted to Mrs. Elton for what was called an _ introduction_--of her going into public under the auspices of a friend of Mrs. Elton's -- probably some vulgar , dashing widow , who , with the help of a boarder , just made a shift to live!-- The dignity of Miss Woodhouse , of Hartfield , was sunk indeed !

text: She restrained herself , however , from any of the reproofs she could have given , and only thanked Mrs. Elton coolly ; " but their going to Bath was quite out of the question ; and she was not perfectly convinced that the place might suit her better than her father .
text_tokenized: She restrained herself , however , from any of the reproofs she could have given , and only thanked Mrs. Elton coolly ; " but their going to Bath was quite out of the question ; and she was not perfectly convinced that the place might suit her better than her father .

text: And then , to prevent farther outrage and indignation , changed the subject directly . "
text_tokenized: And then , to prevent farther outrage and indignation , changed the subject directly . "

text: I do not ask whether you are musical , Mrs. Elton .
text_tokenized: I do not ask whether you are musical , Mrs. Elton .

text: Upon these occasions , a lady 's character generally precedes her ; and Highbury has long known that you are a superior performer . "
text_tokenized: Upon these occasions , a lady 's character generally precedes her ; and Highbury has long known that you are a superior performer . "

text: " Oh ! no , indeed ; I must protest against any such idea .
text_tokenized: " Oh ! no , indeed ; I must protest against any such idea .

text: A superior performer!--very far from it , I assure you .
text_tokenized: A superior performer!--very far from it , I assure you .

text: Consider from how partial a quarter your information came .
text_tokenized: Consider from how partial a quarter your information came .

text: I am doatingly fond of music -- passionately fond;--and my friends say I am not entirely devoid of taste ; but as to any thing else , upon my honour my performance is _ mediocre _ to the last degree . You , Miss Woodhouse , I well know , play delightfully . I assure you it has been the greatest satisfaction , comfort , and delight to me , to hear what a musical society I am got into .
text_tokenized: I am doatingly fond of music -- passionately fond;--and my friends say I am not entirely devoid of taste ; but as to any thing else , upon my honour my performance is _ mediocre _ to the last degree . You , Miss Woodhouse , I well know , play delightfully . I assure you it has been the greatest satisfaction , comfort , and delight to me , to hear what a musical society I am got into .

text: I absolutely can not do without music .
text_tokenized: I absolutely can not do without music .

text: It is a necessary of life to me ; and having always been used to a very musical society , both at Maple Grove and in Bath , it would have been a most serious sacrifice .
text_tokenized: It is a necessary of life to me ; and having always been used to a very musical society , both at Maple Grove and in Bath , it would have been a most serious sacrifice .

text: I honestly said as much to Mr. E. when he was speaking of my future home , and expressing his fears lest the retirement of it should be disagreeable ; and the inferiority of the house too -- knowing what I had been accustomed to -- of course he was not wholly without apprehension . When he was speaking of it in that way , I honestly said that _ the _ _ world _ I could give up -- parties , balls , plays -- for I had no fear of retirement . Blessed with so many resources within myself , the world was not necessary to _ me _ .
text_tokenized: I honestly said as much to Mr. E. when he was speaking of my future home , and expressing his fears lest the retirement of it should be disagreeable ; and the inferiority of the house too -- knowing what I had been accustomed to -- of course he was not wholly without apprehension . When he was speaking of it in that way , I honestly said that _ the _ _ world _ I could give up -- parties , balls , plays -- for I had no fear of retirement . Blessed with so many resources within myself , the world was not necessary to _ me _ .

text: I could do very well without it .
text_tokenized: I could do very well without it .

text: To those who had no resources it was a different thing ; but my resources made me quite independent .
text_tokenized: To those who had no resources it was a different thing ; but my resources made me quite independent .

text: And as to smaller - sized rooms than I had been used to , I really could not give it a thought .
text_tokenized: And as to smaller - sized rooms than I had been used to , I really could not give it a thought .

text: I hoped I was perfectly equal to any sacrifice of that description .
text_tokenized: I hoped I was perfectly equal to any sacrifice of that description .

text: Certainly I had been accustomed to every luxury at Maple Grove ; but I did assure him that two carriages were not necessary to my happiness , nor were spacious apartments .
text_tokenized: Certainly I had been accustomed to every luxury at Maple Grove ; but I did assure him that two carriages were not necessary to my happiness , nor were spacious apartments .

text: ` But , ' said I , ` to be quite honest , I do not think I can live without something of a musical society . I condition for nothing else ; but without music , life would be a blank to me . '
text_tokenized: ` But , ' said I , ` to be quite honest , I do not think I can live without something of a musical society . I condition for nothing else ; but without music , life would be a blank to me . '

text: " We can not suppose , " said Emma , smiling , " that Mr. Elton would hesitate to assure you of there being a _ very _ musical society in Highbury ; and I hope you will not find he has outstepped the truth more than may be pardoned , in consideration of the motive .
text_tokenized: " We can not suppose , " said Emma , smiling , " that Mr. Elton would hesitate to assure you of there being a _ very _ musical society in Highbury ; and I hope you will not find he has outstepped the truth more than may be pardoned , in consideration of the motive .

text: " No , indeed , I have no doubts at all on that head .
text_tokenized: " No , indeed , I have no doubts at all on that head .

text: I am delighted to find myself in such a circle .
text_tokenized: I am delighted to find myself in such a circle .

text: I hope we shall have many sweet little concerts together .
text_tokenized: I hope we shall have many sweet little concerts together .

text: I think , Miss Woodhouse , you and I must establish a musical club , and have regular weekly meetings at your house , or ours . Will not it be a good plan ?
text_tokenized: I think , Miss Woodhouse , you and I must establish a musical club , and have regular weekly meetings at your house , or ours . Will not it be a good plan ?

text: If _ we _ exert ourselves , I think we shall not be long in want of allies .
text_tokenized: If _ we _ exert ourselves , I think we shall not be long in want of allies .

text: Something of that nature would be particularly desirable for _ me _ , as an inducement to keep me in practice ; for married women , you know-- there is a sad story against them , in general .
text_tokenized: Something of that nature would be particularly desirable for _ me _ , as an inducement to keep me in practice ; for married women , you know-- there is a sad story against them , in general .

text: They are but too apt to give up music .
text_tokenized: They are but too apt to give up music .

text: " " But you , who are so extremely fond of it -- there can be no danger , surely ?
text_tokenized: " " But you , who are so extremely fond of it -- there can be no danger , surely ?

text: " I should hope not ; but really when I look around among my acquaintance , I tremble .
text_tokenized: " I should hope not ; but really when I look around among my acquaintance , I tremble .

text: Selina has entirely given up music -- never touches the instrument -- though she played sweetly .
text_tokenized: Selina has entirely given up music -- never touches the instrument -- though she played sweetly .

text: And the same may be said of Mrs. Jeffereys -- Clara Partridge , that was -- and of the two Milmans , now Mrs. Bird and Mrs. James Cooper ; and of more than I can enumerate .
text_tokenized: And the same may be said of Mrs. Jeffereys -- Clara Partridge , that was -- and of the two Milmans , now Mrs. Bird and Mrs. James Cooper ; and of more than I can enumerate .

text: Upon my word it is enough to put one in a fright . I used to be quite angry with Selina ; but really I begin now to comprehend that a married woman has many things to call her attention . I believe I was half an hour this morning shut up with my housekeeper . " " But every thing of that kind , " said Emma , " will soon be in so regular a train-- " " Well , " said Mrs. Elton , laughing , " we shall see . "
text_tokenized: Upon my word it is enough to put one in a fright . I used to be quite angry with Selina ; but really I begin now to comprehend that a married woman has many things to call her attention . I believe I was half an hour this morning shut up with my housekeeper . " " But every thing of that kind , " said Emma , " will soon be in so regular a train-- " " Well , " said Mrs. Elton , laughing , " we shall see . "

text: Emma , finding her so determined upon neglecting her music , had nothing more to say ; and , after a moment 's pause , Mrs. Elton chose another subject .
text_tokenized: Emma , finding her so determined upon neglecting her music , had nothing more to say ; and , after a moment 's pause , Mrs. Elton chose another subject .

text: " We have been calling at Randalls , " said she , " and found them both at home ; and very pleasant people they seem to be .
text_tokenized: " We have been calling at Randalls , " said she , " and found them both at home ; and very pleasant people they seem to be .

text: I like them extremely .
text_tokenized: I like them extremely .

text: Mr. Weston seems an excellent creature-- quite a first - rate favourite with me already , I assure you .
text_tokenized: Mr. Weston seems an excellent creature-- quite a first - rate favourite with me already , I assure you .

text: And _ she _ appears so truly good -- there is something so motherly and kind - hearted about her , that it wins upon one directly .
text_tokenized: And _ she _ appears so truly good -- there is something so motherly and kind - hearted about her , that it wins upon one directly .

text: She was your governess , I think ? "
text_tokenized: She was your governess , I think ? "

text: Emma was almost too much astonished to answer ; but Mrs. Elton hardly waited for the affirmative before she went on .
text_tokenized: Emma was almost too much astonished to answer ; but Mrs. Elton hardly waited for the affirmative before she went on .

text: " Having understood as much , I was rather astonished to find her so very lady - like !
text_tokenized: " Having understood as much , I was rather astonished to find her so very lady - like !

text: But she is really quite the gentlewoman . "
text_tokenized: But she is really quite the gentlewoman . "

text: " Mrs. Weston 's manners , " said Emma , " were always particularly good .
text_tokenized: " Mrs. Weston 's manners , " said Emma , " were always particularly good .

text: Their propriety , simplicity , and elegance , would make them the safest model for any young woman . " " And who do you think came in while we were there ? " Emma was quite at a loss . The tone implied some old acquaintance-- and how could she possibly guess ? " Knightley ! " continued Mrs. Elton ; " Knightley himself!--Was not it lucky?--for , not being within when he called the other day , I had never seen him before ; and of course , as so particular a friend of Mr. E. 's , I had a great curiosity .
text_tokenized: Their propriety , simplicity , and elegance , would make them the safest model for any young woman . " " And who do you think came in while we were there ? " Emma was quite at a loss . The tone implied some old acquaintance-- and how could she possibly guess ? " Knightley ! " continued Mrs. Elton ; " Knightley himself!--Was not it lucky?--for , not being within when he called the other day , I had never seen him before ; and of course , as so particular a friend of Mr. E. 's , I had a great curiosity .

text: ` My friend Knightley ' had been so often mentioned , that I was really impatient to see him ; and I must do my caro sposo the justice to say that he need not be ashamed of his friend .
text_tokenized: ` My friend Knightley ' had been so often mentioned , that I was really impatient to see him ; and I must do my caro sposo the justice to say that he need not be ashamed of his friend .

text: Knightley is quite the gentleman .
text_tokenized: Knightley is quite the gentleman .

text: I like him very much .
text_tokenized: I like him very much .

text: Decidedly , I think , a very gentleman - like man .
text_tokenized: Decidedly , I think , a very gentleman - like man .

text: " Happily , it was now time to be gone .
text_tokenized: " Happily , it was now time to be gone .

text: They were off ; and Emma could breathe .
text_tokenized: They were off ; and Emma could breathe .

text: " Insufferable woman ! " was her immediate exclamation .
text_tokenized: " Insufferable woman ! " was her immediate exclamation .

text: " Worse than I had supposed .
text_tokenized: " Worse than I had supposed .

text: Absolutely insufferable !
text_tokenized: Absolutely insufferable !

text: Knightley!--I could not have believed it .
text_tokenized: Knightley!--I could not have believed it .

text: Knightley!--never seen him in her life before , and call him Knightley!--and discover that he is a gentleman !
text_tokenized: Knightley!--never seen him in her life before , and call him Knightley!--and discover that he is a gentleman !

text: A little upstart , vulgar being , with her Mr. E. , and her _ caro _ _ sposo _ , and her resources , and all her airs of pert pretension and underbred finery .
text_tokenized: A little upstart , vulgar being , with her Mr. E. , and her _ caro _ _ sposo _ , and her resources , and all her airs of pert pretension and underbred finery .

text: Actually to discover that Mr. Knightley is a gentleman !
text_tokenized: Actually to discover that Mr. Knightley is a gentleman !

text: I doubt whether he will return the compliment , and discover her to be a lady .
text_tokenized: I doubt whether he will return the compliment , and discover her to be a lady .

text: I could not have believed it !
text_tokenized: I could not have believed it !

text: And to propose that she and I should unite to form a musical club !
text_tokenized: And to propose that she and I should unite to form a musical club !

text: One would fancy we were bosom friends !
text_tokenized: One would fancy we were bosom friends !

text: And Mrs. Weston!-- Astonished that the person who had brought me up should be a gentlewoman ! Worse and worse .
text_tokenized: And Mrs. Weston!-- Astonished that the person who had brought me up should be a gentlewoman ! Worse and worse .

text: I never met with her equal .
text_tokenized: I never met with her equal .

text: Much beyond my hopes .
text_tokenized: Much beyond my hopes .

text: Harriet is disgraced by any comparison .
text_tokenized: Harriet is disgraced by any comparison .

text: Oh !
text_tokenized: Oh !

text: what would Frank Churchill say to her , if he were here ?
text_tokenized: what would Frank Churchill say to her , if he were here ?

text: How angry and how diverted he would be !
text_tokenized: How angry and how diverted he would be !

text: Ah !
text_tokenized: Ah !

text: there I am-- thinking of him directly
text_tokenized: there I am-- thinking of him directly

text: Always the first person to be thought of !
text_tokenized: Always the first person to be thought of !

text: How I catch myself out !
text_tokenized: How I catch myself out !

text: Frank Churchill comes as regularly into my mind!"-- All this ran so glibly through her thoughts , that by the time her father had arranged himself , after the bustle of the Eltons ' departure , and was ready to speak , she was very tolerably capable of attending .
text_tokenized: Frank Churchill comes as regularly into my mind!"-- All this ran so glibly through her thoughts , that by the time her father had arranged himself , after the bustle of the Eltons ' departure , and was ready to speak , she was very tolerably capable of attending .

text: " Well , my dear , " he deliberately began , " considering we never saw her before , she seems a very pretty sort of young lady ; and I dare say she was very much pleased with you .
text_tokenized: " Well , my dear , " he deliberately began , " considering we never saw her before , she seems a very pretty sort of young lady ; and I dare say she was very much pleased with you .

text: She speaks a little too quick .
text_tokenized: She speaks a little too quick .

text: A little quickness of voice there is which rather hurts the ear .
text_tokenized: A little quickness of voice there is which rather hurts the ear .

text: But I believe I am nice ; I do not like strange voices ; and nobody speaks like you and poor Miss Taylor .
text_tokenized: But I believe I am nice ; I do not like strange voices ; and nobody speaks like you and poor Miss Taylor .

text: However , she seems a very obliging , pretty - behaved young lady , and no doubt will make him a very good wife . Though I think he had better not have married .
text_tokenized: However , she seems a very obliging , pretty - behaved young lady , and no doubt will make him a very good wife . Though I think he had better not have married .

text: I made the best excuses I could for not having been able to wait on him and Mrs. Elton on this happy occasion ; I said that I hoped I _ should _ in the course of the summer . But I ought to have gone before .
text_tokenized: I made the best excuses I could for not having been able to wait on him and Mrs. Elton on this happy occasion ; I said that I hoped I _ should _ in the course of the summer . But I ought to have gone before .

text: Not to wait upon a bride is very remiss .
text_tokenized: Not to wait upon a bride is very remiss .

text: Ah !
text_tokenized: Ah !

text: it shews what a sad invalid I am !
text_tokenized: it shews what a sad invalid I am !

text: But I do not like the corner into Vicarage Lane .
text_tokenized: But I do not like the corner into Vicarage Lane .

text: " " I dare say your apologies were accepted , sir .
text_tokenized: " " I dare say your apologies were accepted , sir .

text: Mr. Elton knows you . "
text_tokenized: Mr. Elton knows you . "

text: " Yes : but a young lady -- a bride -- I ought to have paid my respects to her if possible .
text_tokenized: " Yes : but a young lady -- a bride -- I ought to have paid my respects to her if possible .

text: It was being very deficient . "
text_tokenized: It was being very deficient . "

text: " But , my dear papa , you are no friend to matrimony ; and therefore why should you be so anxious to pay your respects to a _ bride _ ? It ought to be no recommendation to _ you _ .
text_tokenized: " But , my dear papa , you are no friend to matrimony ; and therefore why should you be so anxious to pay your respects to a _ bride _ ? It ought to be no recommendation to _ you _ .

text: It is encouraging people to marry if you make so much of them .
text_tokenized: It is encouraging people to marry if you make so much of them .

text: " No , my dear , I never encouraged any body to marry , but I would always wish to pay every proper attention to a lady -- and a bride , especially , is never to be neglected .
text_tokenized: " No , my dear , I never encouraged any body to marry , but I would always wish to pay every proper attention to a lady -- and a bride , especially , is never to be neglected .

text: More is avowedly due to _ her _ .
text_tokenized: More is avowedly due to _ her _ .

text: A bride , you know , my dear , is always the first in company , let the others be who they may . "
text_tokenized: A bride , you know , my dear , is always the first in company , let the others be who they may . "

text: " Well , papa , if this is not encouragement to marry , I do not know what is .
text_tokenized: " Well , papa , if this is not encouragement to marry , I do not know what is .

text: And I should never have expected you to be lending your sanction to such vanity - baits for poor young ladies .
text_tokenized: And I should never have expected you to be lending your sanction to such vanity - baits for poor young ladies .

text: " My dear , you do not understand me .
text_tokenized: " My dear , you do not understand me .

text: This is a matter of mere common politeness and good - breeding , and has nothing to do with any encouragement to people to marry .
text_tokenized: This is a matter of mere common politeness and good - breeding , and has nothing to do with any encouragement to people to marry .

text: " Emma had done .
text_tokenized: " Emma had done .

text: Her father was growing nervous , and could not understand _ her _ . Her mind returned to Mrs. Elton 's offences , and long , very long , did they occupy her .
